title: Ricky Martin: the Ricky Martin video collection
brief_description: Latin sensation Ricky Martin began as a member of the short-lived boy band, Menudo, before gaining a role on television soap, “General Hospital”. Becoming a solo artist, Ricky’s popularity skyrocketed in the late 1990’s with a string of hit songs including the theme song from the 1998 Soccer World Cup, ‘The Cup of Life’. This DVD includes the songs: Living La Vida Loca (in English and Spanish); She’s all I ever had (in English and Spanish); La Bomba; Perdido Sin Ti; Vuelve; Maria; The Cup of Life.
